author: ClownFish Extreme
comment: Good app. Any one know how to change the temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit on the watch? I have a Huawei watch.

reply.author: Maxim Diland
reply.content: Thanks for your comment. To enter the watch face settings just tap and hold on the watch face. There you'd find what you need.

author: Matthew Hill
comment: Very nice watch face, however is the Google fit data being pulled in correctly? My step counter doesn't match what i have in Google Fit, in fact it's out by nearly 3000 steps. Happy to increase the rating if this gets fixed.

author: Matt Tse
comment: Very nice design. One suggestion for future feature. Would you be able to make it interactive? So when I touch the weather it goes to weather, or when I touch the date it goes to my agenda?
A great and beautiful battery drainer.

reply.author: Maxim Diland
reply.content: could you please describe the issue with battery? How long your wearable device lives using the watch face? We test our watch faces and we do not notice battery issues. Could you please provide the device model name and the android wear version?

author: Nic Corbett
comment: Good watchface.   Good response from developer.

author: Ovidiu Sirb
comment: The first watch face that shows all the info I need and it's nice and uncluttered.
